title: Inward repetition
description:
Use this page to understand the inward repeating pattern found in the automated proof. As a rather trivial observation, it may be worth noting that conjugation invariance is automatic,

$\displaystyle \|gxg^{-1}\| = \frac{\|(gxg^{-1})^n\|}{n} = \frac{\|gx^ng^{-1}\|}{n} \leq \|x\| + O(n^{-1}).$
